title: Amiga PD CD - 17-Bit - Phase Four
description:
Amiga PD CD - 17-Bit - Phase Four

This is the fourth disc of the 17-Bit Collection on Amiga formatted CD, designed to run on an Amiga with an A570 drive or CDTV. 

This CD contains a wealth of early Amiga Public Domain greats: Scene Demos, Music, Utilties, and Games.

You can also use the CDs on Windows systems, all the software is in DMS format so could be converted to ADF with DMS2ADF and then run on an emulator if you must. I&#039;ve included a text file with the conents of this CD so you can have a scan through at what is included without booting it up on an Amiga.

Like the previous three CDs, this one includes a search engine not only for the titles held on this CD but also for the previous ones, so boot from this CD and you can then search and extract titles from the previous three CD&#039;s (as long as you have the other CDs!).

I was able to burn these images onto CD using an NEC burner and could read it both in Windows and on my A500+ with A570.

This one contains mainly AGA or stuff that wasn&#039;t compatible with an A500+, quite a bummer at the time! 

If this is popular then I&#039;ll post the final CD I have in the series, so remember to leave comments if you want more :)

The first two CDs can be found here: http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3907988/Amiga_PD_CDs_-_17_Bit_Collection_A_amp_B

And the third CD can be found here: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3960133/Amiga_PD_CD_-_17-Bit_-_The_Continuation_Disc" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3960133/Amiga_PD_CD_-_17-Bit_-_The_Continuation_Disc</a>
